Command.Statement: SELECT {[Measures].[Sales Count], [Measures].[Store Cost]} DIMENSION PROPERTIES PARENT_UNIQUE_NAME ON COLUMNS , NON EMPTY HIERARCHIZE({DrillDownMember({{DrillDownMember({{DrillDownMember({DrillDownLevel({[Store].[All Stores]})}, {[Store].[All Stores].[USA]})}}, {[Store].[All Stores].[USA].[OR]})}}, {[Store].[All Stores].[USA].[OR].[Salem]})}) DIMENSION PROPERTIES PARENT_UNIQUE_NAME ON ROWS FROM [Sales]
